Hi Jamie,

Apologies on that one. Anyway we have updated the shipping "request a quote" text. 
https://nuplasapiaristsuppliesau.nuplasgroup.kinsta.com/checkout/

Hi Joel,

Thanks.

I think you forgot to update the Request a Quote shipping description to:

The address you have entered falls outside of the eligible area for flat rate delivery charges. If you would like us to quote shipping then please REQUEST A QUOTE.



Kind Regards,
Jamie Shek
Director, Creative Generals

Confirming this is now done. Let me know if this works for you?
https://nuplasapiaristsuppliesau.nuplasgroup.kinsta.com/product/2l-honey-bucket-with-tamper-evident-lid/

Hi Joel and Heath,

Heath, can you please call me if you have any questions about this one?

This is working well 😀

I have some further tweaks for fine tuning. See details below and supporting screenshots attached.

Issue: Currently the default payment option button is 'Request a Quote'. The majority of buyers will be in the $40 or $60 rate shipping range so we don't want them to see the 'Request a Quote' option.

Proposed Solution: Can we please hide the payment option button and only display it when the user has entered their address? At which point the correct option will be displayed to them based on their address.

-----

Text Changes: Please update the shipping description for Request a Quote to:

The address you have entered falls outside of the eligible area for flat rate delivery charges. If you would like us to quote shipping then please REQUEST A QUOTE.

----

Issue: Product Pages - Add to quote option is visible
Propose Solution: Please remove from display completely.

----

Thanks in advance 😀


Kind Regards,
Jamie Shek
Director, Creative Generals

// mobile 0423 592 912
// email jamie@creativegenerals.com.au
// web http://creativegenerals.com.au/
// linkedin creative-generals

Morning Jamie,

Sure, confirming it is now done. please see below:

2300 - 2700 = $60.00 (Flat Rate Shipping)
2701 - 2999 = Request a quote
0200 - 2299 and 3000 - 9999 = $40.00 (Anything else Flat Rate Shipping )

Let me know if this works for you. Cheers!

Hi Joel,

The client wants to further testing. Can you please add the following configuration?

Make postcodes:

  1. 2300 - 2700 Flat Rate Shipping $60.00

  2. 2701 - 2999 Request a quote

  3. Anything else Flat Rate Shipping $40.00



Kind Regards,
Jamie Shek
Director, Creative Generals

Sure, we have setup the staging environment for specific postcodes. You can use the following to test it:
5000 - Stripe/Paypal (South Australia)
2000 - Request a quote (NSW)

https://nuplasapiaristsuppliesau.nuplasgroup.kinsta.com/checkout/

Let me know if this works for you?

Thanks! I can see it working on a State level. Would it be possible to set some specific postcodes within a state to test that theory?

Hi Jamie, 

Ok great, it's now working and tied in with the shipping etc. We have set it up on the staging site: https://nuplasapiaristsuppliesau.nuplasgroup.kinsta.com to allow checkout with shipping included IF you are in South Australia. IF you select New South Wales, the checkout turns into the quotation process. 

Please take it for a spin and let us know what you think? 

Next steps will be to: 

  1. Activate the plugin on the live server
  2. We will then bring across the relevant elements to make it work 
  3. Let us know which postcodes (or cities) you want to trigger the quote request process 
Let us know if you have any questions,

Hi Heath,

I'm pretty sure I activated on the AU staging. Isn't it showing up at you end?

Yes, it's going well. I believe we need a licence for the quoting plugin to make it work. Do you have a second one, as it's a per domain setup. 

We have the quoting side of this setup and are currently hooking into the shipping functions (at the post code level) to show or not show the appropriate option at checkout i.e pay or get a quote.

How are we going with the Nuplas Regional Checkout config on staging?

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

As mentioned on the phone we'd like to implement some changes on the Nuplas Apiarist AU website. Basically the new customer checkout workflow should look like so:

  1. If customers postcode = X then payment option should be Stripe/PayPal etc
  2. If customers postcode = Y then payment option should be Request a Quote (as per NZ)

I know you can set up shipping regions (and be specific about postcode ranges out of the Woo box) and then present different payment options based on that.

Attached is an idea how how the client would be looking to break down regions. We'll confirm which ones will be Request a Quote later. But for now can we please test out the theory in staging?



Kind Regards,
Jamie Shek
Director, Creative Generals

// mobile 0423 592 912
// email jamie@creativegenerals.com.au
// web creativegenerals.com.au
